Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP

Available versions


  • ver. 5.0
  • ver. 6.0
  • ver. 5.4


Back to index Download

Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP

Overview

Based on https://share.zabbix.com/cat-server-hardware/cisco/cisco-ucs-standalone-hw-monitoring

Contains:

MB operation state

rack serial number

Discoveries:

Arrays

CPUs

Disks

Fans

Memory

PSU

Raid batterys

Raid controllers

Author

Dmitry Lavrukhin

Macros used

There are no macros links in this template.

Template links

There are no template links in this template.

Discovery rules

Name Description Type Key and additional info
FAN dsvr <p>-</p> SNMP agent fandsvr<p>Update: 180</p>
CPU dsvr <p>-</p> SNMP agent cpudsvr<p>Update: 180</p>
RAID controller dsvr <p>-</p> SNMP agent raiddsvr<p>Update: 180</p>
ARR dsvr <p>-</p> SNMP agent arrdsvr<p>Update: 180</p>
PSU dsvr <p>-</p> SNMP agent psudsvr<p>Update: 180</p>
RAID battery dsvr <p>-</p> SNMP agent raidbatdsvr<p>Update: 180</p>
MEM dsvr <p>-</p> SNMP agent memdsvr<p>Update: 180</p>
DSK dsvr <p>-</p> SNMP agent dskdsvr<p>Update: 180</p>

Items collected

Name Description Type Key and additional info
MB operation state <p>-</p> SNMP agent mboperstate<p>Update: 30</p>
rack serial number <p>-</p> SNMP agent mbserialnumber<p>Update: 43200</p>
{#SNMPVALUE} status <p>-</p> SNMP agent fanstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}]<p>Update: 30</p><p>LLD</p>
{#SNMPVALUE} status <p>-</p> SNMP agent cpustatus[{#SNMPVALUE}]<p>Update: 30</p><p>LLD</p>
{#SNMPVALUE} status <p>-</p> SNMP agent raidstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}]<p>Update: 30</p><p>LLD</p>
{#SNMPVALUE} array status <p>-</p> SNMP agent arrstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}]<p>Update: 30</p><p>LLD</p>
{#SNMPVALUE} power source status <p>-</p> SNMP agent powerstate[{#SNMPVALUE}]<p>Update: 30</p><p>LLD</p>
{#SNMPVALUE} status <p>-</p> SNMP agent status[{#SNMPVALUE}]<p>Update: 30</p><p>LLD</p>
{#SNMPVALUE} status <p>-</p> SNMP agent raidbatstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}]<p>Update: 30</p><p>LLD</p>
{#SNMPVALUE} status <p>-</p> SNMP agent memstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}]<p>Update: 30</p><p>LLD</p>
{#SNMPVALUE} disk status <p>-</p> SNMP agent diskstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}]<p>Update: 30</p><p>LLD</p>

Triggers

Name Description Expression Priority
Array {#SNMPVALUE} in degraded state <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP:arrstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP:cpustatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
Disk {#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP:diskstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP:fanstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP:memstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} have problems with power source <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP:powerstate[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>4</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP:status[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP:raidbatstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP:raidstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP:fanstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP:cpustatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP:raidstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
Array {#SNMPVALUE} in degraded state (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP:arrstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} have problems with power source (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP:powerstate[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>4</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP:status[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP:raidbatstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP:memstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
Disk {#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP:diskstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high

Triggers

Name Description Expression Priority
Array {#SNMPVALUE} in degraded state <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP/arrstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}])<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP/cpustatus[{#SNMPVALUE}])<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
Disk {#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP/diskstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}])<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP/fanstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}])<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP/memstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}])<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} have problems with power source <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP/powerstate[{#SNMPVALUE}])<>4</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP/status[{#SNMPVALUE}])<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP/raidbatstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}])<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP/raidstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}])<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP/cpustatus[{#SNMPVALUE}])<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} have problems with power source (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP/powerstate[{#SNMPVALUE}])<>4</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP/status[{#SNMPVALUE}])<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
Disk {#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP/diskstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}])<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} in not operate state (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/Cisco UCS Standalone SNMP/raidbatstatus[{#SNMPVALUE}])<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
